mapper.insert: insert into tbl_payment (payCode, id, name, price, productCode ,amount, address, contact) values (#{payCode}, #{id}, #{name}, #{price}, #{productCode}, #{amount}, #{address}, #{contact})
insert into tbl_payment_detail (detailNo, payCode, productCode, amount) select tbl_payment_detail_seq.nextval, #{payCode}, productCode, amount from tbl_cart
mapper.select: select payCode, id, name, address, contact, amount, price, payDate, productCode from tbl_payment where id = #{id}

select p.payCode, p.id, p.name, p.address, p.contact, p.amount, p.price, p.payDate, p.productCode, d.detailNo, d.productCode, d.amount, g.productName, g.price from tbl_payment p inner join tbl_payment_detail d on p.payCode = d.payCode inner join tbl_product g on d.productCode = g.productCode where p.id = #{id} and p.payCode = #{payCode}
